vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
παροιμ-ία, ἡ,
proverb, maxim, saw, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; κατὰ τὴν π. as the saying goes, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; καθάπερ ἡ π.[Refs 5th c.BC+]: in plural, of the Proverbs of Solomon, LXX
__2 figure, comparison, [NT]
__3 digression, incidental remark, [Refs 3rd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
figure of speech, proverb, maxim
a by-word, proverb, adage, 2Pet. 2:22; in NT an obscure saying, enigma, figure of speech Jn. 16:25, 29; a parable, similitude, figurative discourse, Jn. 10:6*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 諺語, 格言 (彼後 2:22)
2) 隱晦, 象徵性的話
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 谚语, 格言 (彼后 2:22)
2) 隐晦, 象征性的话
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: ẩn dụ; tục ngữ; một câu chuyện ngụ ngôn. παρά (G3844) + οἴομαι (G3633)
